about_the_game:
Story: Andrei moved to Moscow for work and rented an apartment in a panel house, which suited his budget. Soon, living in the apartment, he began to notice strange things happening every night. Somebody knocks on the door or it just opens by itself, then in the middle of the night strange sounds and voices wake me up. During the day everything seemed to go back to normal.

The landlady forgot to warn that Andrei would have neighbors cohabiting with him in the same apartment. She warned him only after moving in, leaving a note saying that he should behave quietly and not make noise, and not to go where he shouldn't.

In the center of the story - the apartment, where the main action of the game takes place. Here Andrew meets strange neighbors who lived in the apartment before him. Waking up in the middle of the night, Andrei observes the neighbors, exploring the locked rooms and studying the notes they left behind. Just like that, he finds himself stuck in this apartment, which used to seem like cheap housing in an old Soviet building.

Game Features:

- A typical plot in the current worldly realities.

- A game in the genre of “walking simulator”.

- The passage of no more than an hour.

- Uncover the frightening secrets of mysterious neighbors.

- Meet the consequences of the revealed secrets.

- Soviet apartment atmosphere in our time.

About the Game

Story: Andrei moved to Moscow for work and rented an apartment in a panel house, which suited his budget. Soon, living in the apartment, he began to notice strange things happening every night. Somebody knocks on the door or it just opens by itself, then in the middle of the night strange sounds and voices wake me up. During the day everything seemed to go back to normal.

The landlady forgot to warn that Andrei would have neighbors cohabiting with him in the same apartment. She warned him only after moving in, leaving a note saying that he should behave quietly and not make noise, and not to go where he shouldn't.

In the center of the story - the apartment, where the main action of the game takes place. Here Andrew meets strange neighbors who lived in the apartment before him. Waking up in the middle of the night, Andrei observes the neighbors, exploring the locked rooms and studying the notes they left behind. Just like that, he finds himself stuck in this apartment, which used to seem like cheap housing in an old Soviet building.

name: MosGhost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia geforce rtx 3060 / Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia geforce rtx 3070 / AMD RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Having moved to Moscow, Andrei rents a cheap apartment in an old Soviet house. After a while, he notices strange things happening in the dark. It seems that the landlady has left unsaid something....
supported_languages:
English, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
